instruction: Create a data visualiation from table below
input:
Cities     |Temperature |Precipitation
San Jose   |    75 F   |     0.2 inch
Vancouver  |    43 F   |     0.8 inch
New York   |    66 F   |     0.3 inch
output: A simple bar chart showing the temperature of three cities (San Jose, Vancouver, and New York) with the precipitation as labels, would be suitable for this data. The x-axis would be labeled with the three cities and the y-axis would show the temperature in Fahrenheit. A dashed vertical line could be added to show the average temperature.
